name: freecodecamp
description: FreeCodeCamp is a non-profit organization consisting of an interactive web learning platform, an online community forum, chat rooms, online publications, and local organizations that aim to teach web development accessible to all.

name: codeingame
description: CodinGame is a website dedicated to playful computer programming, offering on one side puzzles of increasing difficulty to solve in one of the twenty-five programming languages !

name: codesignal
description: CodeSignal is a technical interview and assessment platform operated by the American company BrainFights.

name: hackerRank
description: HackerRank is the market-leading remote technical assessment and interview solution for developer hiring. Learn to hire technical talent from anywhere !

name: skillvalue
description: Challenge yourself with technical quizzes, choose from +1000 technical tests and get noticed. Showcase your skills now and get a certification !

name: openclassrooms
description: OpenClassrooms is an online training website, created in 1999 under the name Site du ZÃ©ro. It offers its members certifying courses and paths leading to growing careers (ideal for beginners).

name: w3schools
description: W3Schools is a website for online learning of web technologies. Its content includes tutorials and references related to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON, PHP, AngularJS, SQL, Bootstrap, Node.js, jQuery, XQuery, AJAX, and XML. It receives over 10 million unique visitors per month.
